ClusterMate-parent 0.8.6-SNAPSHOT API

Packages 
Package Description
com.fasterxml.clustermate.api
Main shared (used by client and server components) types of ClusterMate system.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.api.msg  
com.fasterxml.clustermate.client
Main public types for ClusterMate client module; most important of which is NetworkClient that is the object application code uses to access data in the logical distributed Store.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.ahc  
com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.call
Package that contains abstractions used for handling of a single physical call by client to server.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster
Package that contains client-side abstractions that deal with state of server, including rudimentary information about possible server clusters.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.operation
Package that contains abstractions used for handling of logical operations that may consist of multiple physical (HTTP) calls.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.util  
com.fasterxml.clustermate.dw
Package that contains basic components needed to run a ClusterMate-based service on DropWizard container.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.jaxrs
Package that contains glue code between "native" interface storage system exposes, and JAX-RS container itself: mostly just resource end points.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.json
Package that contains Jackson converters, primarily for reading/writing data as JSON, but also applicable to other formats Jackson supports.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service
Package contains basic building that are useful for building actual services around StoreMate store implementation.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.bdb  
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cfg  
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cleanup  
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster  
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.http
Package that contains tiny abstraction layer needed to allow running store via alternate HTTP abstraction layers; initially "Plain Old Servlet" or JAX-RS.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.msg
Package that contains server-side service abstractions for POJOs used for response Objects.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.servlet  
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.store
Package that contains functionality that implements access to the actual distributed data store.
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.sync  
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.util  
com.fasterxml.clustermate.std
Standard implementations for some of public interfaces ClusterMate exposes: currently mostly implementations for simple HTTP access using JDK-provided HTTP client functionality.
